description:
With a mixture of video lectures and quizzes to reinforce your learning, this intensive communication skills training course you will teach you…

The Big Picture:

  • What is Communication?
  • How Do We Communicate?
  • Other Factors in Communication

Communication Barriers: Understand them and how to overcome them

  • An Overview of Common Barriers
  • Language Barriers
  • Cultural Barriers

Paraverbal Communication Skills

  • The Power of Pitch
  • The Truth about Tone
  • The Strength of Speed

Non-Verbal Communication

  • All About Body Language
  • Interpreting Gestures

Speaking Like a STAR

  • S = Situation
  • T = Task
  • A = Action
  • R = Result
  • Summary

Listening Skills: Effective interpersonal skills

  • Understanding Active Listening
  • Sending Good Signals to Others

Asking Good Questions

  • Open Questions
  • Closed Questions
  • Probing Questions

Appreciative Inquiry

  • The Purpose of AI
  • The Four Stages
  • Examples and Case Studies
title: Communication Skills: Improve Your Skills in 1 Day
